pages.text: A seven-sided die in the colors of the rainbow.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Deals up to 7 extra damage, applies a random effect from the following list to both the attacker and the target for 2.5 seconds.$(li)Strength$(/li)$(li)Resistance$(/li)$(li)Unluck$(/li)$(li)Luck$(/li)$(li)Speed$(/li)$(li)Slowness$(/li)$(li)Levitation$(/li)
Combine ??? and a bucket of paint in a totem lathe.
